## Installation

```bash
pip install py-multiauth
```

```python
from multiauth import ...
```

## Supported methods

|Name     |Authenticate|Refresh|Extra    |
|---------|:----------:|:-----:|---------|
|`API_KEY`|✓           |       |         |
|`AWS`    |✓           |✓      |Signature|
|`BASIC`  |✓           |       |         |
|`REST`   |✓           |✓      |         |
|`DIGEST` |✓           |       |         |
|`GRAPHQL`|✓           |       |         |
|`HAWK`   |✓           |       |         |
|`MANUAL` |✓           |       |         |
|`OAUTH`  |✓           |✓      |         |
